title.narrative: A one-stop digital service center to address trafficking during COVID-19 in Bangladesh

description.narrative: Keraniganj Upazila in Dhaka accounts for 7.79% of the total international labor migration from Bangladesh and is a hotspot for trafficking, especially of women. There is a high concentration of women-returnee migrants, many of them victims of labor and sex trafficking. CTCs lack IT systems such as computers, connectivity, or online skills to help victims online. As a result, the victims of trafficking remain unidentified and do not have access to the assistance they need. Therefore, the project intends to address these problems.
Expenditure 2021
